p: With a long history spanning many centuries, wars and colonization which led to the melting of different civilizations (Berber, Greco-Roman, Arab, Ottoman and French), Algeria is characterized as well by its diversified ethnic groups, cultures, languages and beliefs which leads subsequently in turn to diversified traditional medicinal practices. Hence, the traditional uses of natural products in Algeria constitute an important opportunity for focused screening based on their ethnopharmacological and ethnomedicinal utilizations.
